title: The Wild West of Shadow IT
description: Everyone’s an IT decision-maker now. The employees in your organization can install a plugin with just one click, and they don’t need to clear it with your team first. It’s great for productivity, but it’s a serious problem for your security posture. When the floodgates of SaaS and AI opened, IT didn’t just get democratized, its security got outpaced.
